thing-type.description: In-Wall Dimmer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtAlso goes by GE / Jasco catalog number 12724.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtWhen prompted by your primary controller, tap the top or bottom of the rocker.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap the top or bottom of the rocker.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Night Light
parameter.description: Night Light<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefines the behavior of the blue LED.</p&gt <p&gtDefault is Night Light mode where LED is on when switch is off.</p&gt</p&gt

options.option: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Invert Switch
parameter.description: Invert Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtInvert the ON/OFF Switch State.</p&gt <p&gtSetting this parameter to Yes will change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom to ON.</p&gt <p&gtNote: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, the load will now be control</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
parameter.description: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: On/Off Command Dim Rate
parameter.description: On/Off Command Dim Rate<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution.
